  • Method Details

    • copyToLocal

      public static Boolean copyToLocal(alluxio.AlluxioURI srcPath, alluxio.AlluxioURI dstPath, alluxio.grpc.ReadPType readType)
      Copies a file or a directory from the Alluxio filesystem to the local filesystem.
      Parameters:
      srcPath - the source AlluxioURI (could be a file or a directory)
      dstPath - the AlluxioURI of the destination in the local filesystem
      readType - the Alluxio read type
      Returns:
      true, if the operation succeeded, false otherwise

    • copyFromLocal

      public static Boolean copyFromLocal(alluxio.AlluxioURI srcPath, alluxio.AlluxioURI dstPath, alluxio.grpc.WritePType writeType) throws alluxio.exception.AlluxioException, IOException, RuntimeException
      copies a file or directory specified by srcPath from the local filesystem to dstPath in the Alluxio filesystem space, assuming dstPath does not exist.
      Parameters:
      srcPath - the AlluxioURI of the source file in the local filesystem
      dstPath - the AlluxioURI of the destination
      writeType - WritePType for controlling caching and persistence
      Returns:
      true, if the operation succeeded, false otherwise
      Throws:
      alluxio.exception.AlluxioException - if an error occurred in the Alluxio library
      IOException - if srcPath points to an empty directory, or if the destination directory cannot be created
      RuntimeException - when failed to send messages to the pool
